question:
You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell how you feel. Write a letter to the singer. In your letter:


say how you feel about his performancegive details of your musical activitiesexplain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I am writing to let you know how much I enjoyed your recent concert in Mumbai. I have been a huge fan of yours and seeing you perform live was such a blessing.
The songs you picked were amongst my favourites and you sang them so well. Your powerful voice gave me goosebumps and I could sense the audience loved them too.

Being an aspiring musician, I have been training in various genres of music for more than 5 years and am an active member in a 6-member band. We keep performing our own creations in small gatherings and post them online.

I would appreciate it if you could have a look at our music at the link below and provide your valuable feedback. It will encourage us even more and help us to reach a larger audience if you could also post a few words about our band on our social media account.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
